summary: The Temptations are an American singing group from Detroit. They were super popular in the 1960s and 1970s, especially with their producer Norman Whitfield. Their music, like "Cloud Nine" and "My Girl," helped create new sounds in R&B and soul. The group is known for their cool dance moves, unique harmonies, and stylish clothes. They've sold millions of albums and won many awards, including Grammys. The original group had five members, and there have been changes over the years, but they keep making music and performing.
title: The Temptations
